entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is a centaur who has agreed to work for Professor Dumbledore, which is seen as a betrayal by the other centaurs. He is described as swishing his long palomino tail and raising his hand towards the leafy canopy overhead.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati raises her hand to ask a question about Firenze's banishment from the centaurs.

entities.name: professor dumbledore
entities.description: Professor Dumbledore is mentioned as the reason why Firenze has been banished by the other centaurs.

entities.name: bane
entities.description: Bane is a centaur who had previously shouted at Firenze for allowing Harry to ride on his back.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry remembers how Bane had shouted at Firenze and wonders if it was Bane who kicked Firenze in the chest.

relationships.description: Firenze has agreed to work for Professor Dumbledore, which is seen as a betrayal by the other centaurs.
Bane had kicked Firenze in the chest.
